title: A view of the marginal notes of the popish Testament, translated into English by the English fugitiue papists resiant at Rhemes in France. By George Wither
author: Wither, George, 1540-1605.
publisher: By Edm. Bollifant for Thomas Woodcocke,
notes: Attacking the marginalia of the Douai translation of the New Testament.
Dedication dated: the xij. of Aprill. 1588.
Running title reads: A view of the marginall notes of the Rhemish Testament.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
